trans-unit.source: Modifying DateTimeFormatInfo properties
trans-unit.target: 修改 DateTimeFormatInfo 属性

trans-unit.source: You can change the result string produced by date and time format strings by modifying the associated properties of a writable <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: 你可以更改通过修改的可写的关联的属性的日期和时间格式字符串产生的结果字符串<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>对象。

trans-unit.source: To determine if a <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object is writable, use the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.IsReadOnly%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定如果<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>对象是可写，则使用<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.IsReadOnly%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: To customize a <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object in this way:
trans-unit.target: 若要自定义<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>对象以这种方式：

trans-unit.source: Create a read/write copy of a <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object whose formatting conventions you want to modify.
trans-unit.target: 创建的读/写副本<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>对象你想要修改其格式设置约定。

trans-unit.source: (See the [Instantiating a DateTimeFormatInfo object](#instantiating) section.)
trans-unit.target: (请参阅[DateTimeFormatInfo 对象进行实例化](#instantiating)部分。)

trans-unit.source: Modify the property or properties that are used to produce the desired result string.
trans-unit.target: 修改或多个用于生成所需的结果字符串的属性。

trans-unit.source: (For information about how formatting methods use <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> properties to define result strings, see the previous section, [Format strings and DateTimeFormatInfo properties](#properties).)
trans-unit.target: (有关如何格式设置方法使用<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>属性以定义结果字符串，请参阅上一节[格式化字符串和 DateTimeFormatInfo 属性](#properties)。)

trans-unit.source: Use the custom <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object you created as the <xref:System.IFormatProvider> argument in calls to formatting methods.
trans-unit.target: 使用自定义<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>对象你创建为<xref:System.IFormatProvider>为格式化方法的调用中的自变量。

trans-unit.source: There are two other ways to change the format of a result string:
trans-unit.target: 有两种方法可更改的结果字符串的格式：

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder> class to define either a custom culture (a culture that has a unique name and that supplements existing cultures) or a replacement culture (one that is used instead of a specific culture).
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder>类来定义自定义区域性 （的区域性，它具有一个唯一的名称且补充现有区域性） 或替换区域性 （一个使用而不是特定区域性）。

trans-unit.source: You can save and access this culture programmatically as you would any <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object supported by the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 可以保存并以编程方式访问此区域性，就像任何<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.NET Framework 支持的对象。

trans-unit.source: If the result string is not culture-sensitive and doesn't follow a predefined format, you can use a custom date and time format string.
trans-unit.target: 如果结果字符串不区分区域性的并且不遵循预定义的格式，你可以使用自定义日期和时间格式字符串。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are serializing date and time data in the format YYYYMMDDHHmmss, you can generate the result string by passing the custom format string to the <xref:System.DateTime.ToString%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, and you can convert the result string back to a <xref:System.DateTime> value by calling the <xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您要序列化格式 YYYYMMDDHHmmss 的日期和时间数据，你可以生成的结果字符串由传递的自定义格式字符串<xref:System.DateTime.ToString%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，并且你可以将结果字符串转换回<xref:System.DateTime>值通过调用<xref:System.DateTime.ParseExact%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: Changing the short date pattern
trans-unit.target: 更改短日期模式

trans-unit.source: The following example changes the format of a result string produced by the "d" (short date) standard format string.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例更改"d"（短日期） 标准格式字符串由生成的结果字符串的格式。

trans-unit.source: It changes the associated <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.ShortDatePattern%2A> property for the en-US or English (United States) culture from its default of "M/d/yyyy" to "yyyy'-"MM"-"dd" and uses the "d" standard format string to display the date both before and after the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.ShortDatePattern%2A> property is changed.
trans-unit.target: 更改关联<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.ShortDatePattern%2A>EN-US 或英语 （美国） 区域性，从"d/yyyy"到其默认属性"yyyy-"MM"-"dd"，并使用"d"标准格式字符串来显示日期之前和之后均<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.ShortDatePattern%2A>属性是更改。

trans-unit.source: Changing the date separator character
trans-unit.target: 更改日期分隔符字符

trans-unit.source: The following example changes the date separator character in a <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that represents the formatting conventions of the fr-FR culture.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例更改中的日期分隔符字符<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>表示 FR-FR 区域性的格式设置约定的对象。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the "g" standard format string to display the date both before and after the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.DateSeparator%2A> property is changed.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用"g"标准格式字符串来显示日期之前和之后均<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.DateSeparator%2A>属性更改。

trans-unit.source: Changing day name abbreviations and the long date pattern
trans-unit.target: 更改天名称缩写和的长日期模式

trans-unit.source: In some cases, the long date pattern, which typically displays the full day and month name along with the number of the day of the month and the year, may be too long.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，长日期模式中，通常会显示完整的日期和月份名称以及月份和年份中某天的数量，可能会太长。

trans-unit.source: The following example shortens the long date pattern for the en-US culture to return a one-character or two-character day name abbreviation followed by the day number, the month name abbreviation, and the year.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例将缩短要返回天数后跟一个字符或两个字符的星期几名称的缩写、 月份名称缩写和年的 EN-US 区域性的长日期模式。

trans-unit.source: It does this by assigning shorter day name abbreviations to the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.AbbreviatedDayNames%2A> array, and by modifying the custom format string assigned to the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.LongDatePattern%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 这是通过将分配到较短的一天名称缩写<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.AbbreviatedDayNames%2A>数组，并通过修改自定义格式字符串分配给<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.LongDatePattern%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This affects the result strings returned by the "D" and "f" standard format strings.
trans-unit.target: 这会影响结果字符串由"D"和"f"标准格式字符串。

trans-unit.source: Ordinarily, the change to the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.LongDatePattern%2A> property also affects the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.FullDateTimePattern%2A> property, which in turn defines the result string returned by the "F" standard format string.
trans-unit.target: 通常，更改为<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.LongDatePattern%2A>属性还会影响<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.FullDateTimePattern%2A>属性，又定义了"F"标准格式字符串返回的结果字符串。

trans-unit.source: To preserve the original full date and time pattern, the example reassigns the original custom format string assigned to the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.FullDateTimePattern%2A> property after the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.LongDatePattern%2A> property is modified.
trans-unit.target: 若要保留原始完整的日期和时间模式，该示例将重新分配原始的自定义格式字符串分配给<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.FullDateTimePattern%2A>属性后的<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.LongDatePattern%2A>修改属性。

trans-unit.source: Changing from a 12-hour clock to a 24-hour clock
trans-unit.target: 从以 12 小时时钟制更改为 24 小时制

trans-unit.source: For many cultures in the .NET Framework, the time is expressed by using a 12-hour clock and an AM/PM designator.
trans-unit.target: 对于.NET Framework 中的许多区域性的时间表示通过以 12 小时时钟制和 AM/PM 指示符。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a `ReplaceWith24HourClock` method that replaces any time format that uses a 12-hour clock with a format that uses a 24-hour clock.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例定义`ReplaceWith24HourClock`替换任何以 12 小时时钟制使用以使用 24 小时制的格式的时间格式的方法。

trans-unit.source: The example uses a regular expression to modify the format string.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用正则表达式来修改格式字符串。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression pattern `@"^(?<openAMPM>\s*t+\s*)? (?(openAMPM) h+(?<nonHours>[^ht]+)$ | \s*h+(?<nonHours>[^ht]+)\s*t+)` is defined as follows:
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式模式`@"^(?<openAMPM>\s*t+\s*)? (?(openAMPM) h+(?<nonHours>[^ht]+)$ | \s*h+(?<nonHours>[^ht]+)\s*t+)`，如下所示定义：

trans-unit.source: Pattern
trans-unit.target: 模式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Begin the match at the beginning of the string.
trans-unit.target: 从字符串开头开始匹配。

trans-unit.source: Match zero or one occurrence of zero or more white-space characters, followed by the letter "t" one or more times, followed by zero or more white-space characters.
trans-unit.target: 匹配零个或一个匹配项的零个或多个空格字符后, 跟字母"t"一个或更多次后, 跟零个或多个空白字符。

trans-unit.source: This capturing group is named `openAMPM`.
trans-unit.target: 名为此捕获组`openAMPM`。

trans-unit.source: If the `openAMPM` group has a match, match the letter "h" one or more times, followed by one or more characters that are neither "h" nor "t".
trans-unit.target: 如果`openAMPM`组都没有匹配项，匹配的字母"h"一个或多个时间跟在非"h"非"t"的一个或多个字符。

trans-unit.source: The match ends at the end of the string.
trans-unit.target: 在字符串的结尾结束匹配。

trans-unit.source: All characters captured after "h" are included in a capturing group named `nonHours`.
trans-unit.target: 后"h"包含在名为的捕获组捕获的所有字符`nonHours`。

trans-unit.source: If the `openAMPM` group does not have a match, match the letter "h" one or more times, followed by one or more characters that are neither "h" nor "t", followed by zero or more white-space characters.
trans-unit.target: 如果`openAMPM`组没有匹配项，匹配"h"一个或多个时间，跟一个或多个字符的非"h"非"t"后, 跟零个或多个空白字符的字母。

trans-unit.source: Finally, match one or more occurrences of the letter "t".
trans-unit.target: 最后，匹配字母"t"的一个或多个匹配的项。

trans-unit.source: All characters captured after "h" and before the white-spaces and "t" are included in a capturing group named `nonHours`.
trans-unit.target: 在"h"之后和之前的空白区域和"t"包括在名为的捕获组捕获的所有字符`nonHours`。

trans-unit.source: The `nonHours` capturing group contains the minute and possibly the second component of a custom date and time format string, along with any time separator symbols.
trans-unit.target: `nonHours`捕获组包含分钟和可能的自定义日期和时间格式字符串的第二个组件以及与任何时间分隔符符号。

trans-unit.source: The replacement pattern `HH${nonHours}` prepends the substring "HH" to these elements.
trans-unit.target: 替换模式`HH${nonHours}`前面添加对这些元素的子字符串"HH"。

trans-unit.source: Displaying and changing the era in a date
trans-unit.target: 显示和更改日期中的纪元

trans-unit.source: The following example adds the "g" custom format specifier to the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.LongDatePattern%2A> property of an object that represents the formatting conventions of the en-US culture.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例将添加到"g"自定义格式说明符<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.LongDatePattern%2A>表示 EN-US 区域性的格式设置约定的对象的属性。

trans-unit.source: This addition affects the following three standard format strings:
trans-unit.target: 此添加影响以下三个标准格式字符串：

trans-unit.source: The "D" (long date) standard format string, which maps directly to the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.LongDatePattern%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: "D"（长日期） 标准格式字符串，其直接映射到<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.LongDatePattern%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The "f" (full date / short time) standard format string, which produces a result string that concatenates the substrings produced by the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.LongDatePattern%2A> and <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.ShortTimePattern%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: "F"(完整日期 / 短时间) 标准格式字符串，产生的结果字符串串联的子字符串由<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.LongDatePattern%2A>和<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.ShortTimePattern%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The "F" (full date / long time) standard format string, which maps directly to the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.FullDateTimePattern%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: "F"(完整日期 / 长时间) 标准格式字符串，直接映射到<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.FullDateTimePattern%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Because we have not explicitly set this property value, it is generated dynamically by concatenating the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.LongDatePattern%2A> and <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.LongTimePattern%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 因为我们未显式设置此属性值，动态生成通过串联<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.LongDatePattern%2A>和<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.LongTimePattern%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The example also shows how to change the era name for a culture whose calendar has a single era.
trans-unit.target: 该示例还演示如何更改其日历具有单个纪元区域性的纪元名称。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the en-US culture uses the Gregorian calendar, which is represented by a <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar> object.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，EN-US 区域性使用公历，由表示<xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar> class supports a single era, which it names A.D.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>类支持单个纪元，其名称公元

trans-unit.source: (Anno Domini).
trans-unit.target: （公元）。

trans-unit.source: The example changes the era name to C.E.
trans-unit.target: 该示例的纪元名称更改为公元

trans-unit.source: (Common Era) by replacing the "g" custom format specifier in the format string assigned to the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.FullDateTimePattern%2A> property with a literal string.
trans-unit.target: （基督纪元） 通过将分配给格式字符串中的"g"自定义格式说明符<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.FullDateTimePattern%2A>与文字字符串的属性。

trans-unit.source: The use of a literal string is necessary, because the era name is typically returned by the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.GetEraName%2A> method from private data in the culture tables supplied by either the .NET Framework or the Windows operating system.
trans-unit.target: 文字字符串的使用是必需的因为通常返回纪元名称<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.GetEraName%2A>从.NET Framework 或 Windows 操作系统提供的区域性表中的私有数据的方法。

trans-unit.source: Parsing date and time strings
trans-unit.target: 分析日期和时间字符串

trans-unit.source: Parsing involves converting the string representation of a date and time to a <xref:System.DateTime> or <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> value.
trans-unit.target: 分析包括将转换的字符串表示形式的日期和时间<xref:System.DateTime>或<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>值。

trans-unit.source: Both of these types include the `Parse`, `TryParse`, `ParseExact`, and `TryParseExact` methods to support parsing operations.
trans-unit.target: 这两种类型包括`Parse`， `TryParse`， `ParseExact`，和`TryParseExact`方法，以支持分析操作。

trans-unit.source: The `Parse` and `TryParse` methods convert a string that can have a variety of formats, whereas `ParseExact` and `TryParseExact` require that the string have a defined format or formats.
trans-unit.target: `Parse`和`TryParse`的方法将转换可以具有多种格式，一个字符串，而`ParseExact`和`TryParseExact`要求字符串具有定义的格式。

trans-unit.source: If the parsing operation fails, `Parse` and `ParseExact` throw an exception, whereas `TryParse` and `TryParseExact` return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果在分析操作失败，`Parse`和`ParseExact`引发异常，而`TryParse`和`TryParseExact`返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: The parsing methods implicitly or explicitly use a <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles> enumeration value to determine which style elements (such as leading, trailing, or inner white space) can be present in the string to be parsed, and how to interpret the parsed string or any missing elements.
trans-unit.target: 分析方法隐式或显式使用<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles>枚举值来确定的样式元素 （例如前导、 尾随，或内部空白） 可出现在字符串无法被分析，以及如何解释已分析的字符串或任何缺少元素。

trans-unit.source: If you don't provide a <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles> value when you call the `Parse` or `TryParse` method, the default is <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AllowWhiteSpaces?displayProperty=nameWithType>, which is a composite style that includes the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AllowLeadingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AllowTrailingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AllowInnerWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType> flags.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles>值在调用时`Parse`或`TryParse`方法，默认值是<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AllowWhiteSpaces?displayProperty=nameWithType>，这是包含的复合样式<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AllowLeadingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AllowTrailingWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType>，和<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AllowInnerWhite?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志。

trans-unit.source: For the `ParseExact` and `TryParseExact` methods, the default is <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.None?displayProperty=nameWithType>; the input string must correspond precisely to a particular custom date and time format string.
trans-unit.target: 有关`ParseExact`和`TryParseExact`方法，默认值是<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.None?displayProperty=nameWithType>; 输入的字符串必须精确对应特定自定义日期和时间格式字符串。

trans-unit.source: The parsing methods also implicitly or explicitly use a <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that defines the specific symbols and patterns that can occur in the string to be parsed.
trans-unit.target: 分析方法，还将隐式或显式使用<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>定义特定的符号和模式的对象会导致要分析的字符串。

trans-unit.source: If you don't provide a <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object, the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object for the current thread culture is used by default.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>对象，<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>默认情况下使用当前线程区域性的对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information about parsing date and time strings, see the individual parsing methods, such as <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.DateTime.TryParse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ParseExact%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.TryParseExact%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关分析日期和时间字符串的详细信息，请参阅各个的分析方法，如<xref:System.DateTime.Parse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.DateTime.TryParse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ParseExact%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，和<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.TryParseExact%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the culture-sensitive nature of parsing date and time strings.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例阐释了分析的日期和时间字符串的区分区域性的性质。

trans-unit.source: It tries to parse two date strings by using the conventions of the en-US, en-GB, fr-FR, and fi-FI cultures.
trans-unit.target: 它将尝试通过使用 EN-US、 EN-GB、 FR-FR 和 fi FI 区域性的约定来分析两个日期字符串。

trans-unit.source: The date that is interpreted as 8/18/2014 in the en-US culture throws a <xref:System.FormatException> exception in the other three cultures because 18 is interpreted as the month number.
trans-unit.target: 将被解释为 8/18/2014 中为 EN-US 的日期区域性引发<xref:System.FormatException>在其他第三个异常区域性因为 18 解释为月份号。

trans-unit.source: 1/2/2015 is parsed as the second day of the first month in the en-US culture, but as the first day of the second month in the remaining cultures.
trans-unit.target: 2015 年 1 月 2 日被解析为 EN-US 区域性中的第一个月的第二个天而应用作剩余区域性的第二个月的第一天。

trans-unit.source: Date and time strings are typically parsed for two reasons:
trans-unit.target: 有两个原因通常分析日期和时间的字符串：

trans-unit.source: To convert user input into a date and time value.
trans-unit.target: 若要将用户输入转换为日期和时间值。

trans-unit.source: To round-trip a date and time value; that is, to deserialize a date and time value that was previously serialized as a string.
trans-unit.target: 往返日期和时间值;也就是说，反序列化以前序列化为字符串的日期和时间值。

trans-unit.source: The following sections discuss these two operations in greater detail.
trans-unit.target: 以下各节讨论更详细介绍这两个操作。

trans-unit.source: Parsing user strings
trans-unit.target: 分析用户字符串

trans-unit.source: When you parse date and time strings input by the user, you should always instantiate a <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that reflects the user's cultural settings, including any customizations the user may have made.
trans-unit.target: 当分析用户输入的日期和时间字符串时，应始终实例<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>反映用户的区域性设置，包括用户可能已做的任何自定义的对象。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the date and time object may have incorrect values.
trans-unit.target: 否则，日期和时间对象可能具有不正确的值。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to instantiate a <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that reflects user cultural customizations, see the [DateTimeFormatInfo and dynamic data](#dynamic) section.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何实例化信息<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>对象以反映用户区域性自定义项，请参阅[DateTimeFormatInfo 和动态数据](#dynamic)部分。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the difference between a parsing operation that reflects user cultural settings and one that does not.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示的分析操作中反映用户区域性设置和不之间的差异。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the default system culture is en-US, but the user has used Control Panel, **Region and Language** to change the short date pattern from its default of "M/d/yyyy" to "yy/MM/dd".
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，默认系统区域性为 EN-US，但用户使用控制面板中，**地区和语言**从其默认的"年-月-日"的短日期模式更改为"yy/MM/dd"。

trans-unit.source: When the user enters a string that reflects user settings, and the string is parsed by a <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that also reflects user settings (overrides), the parsing operation returns a correct result.
trans-unit.target: 当用户输入一个字符串，反映用户设置，并对字符串进行分析通过<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>还反映用户设置 （重写） 的对象在分析操作返回正确的结果。

trans-unit.source: However, when the string is parsed by a <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that reflects standard en-US cultural settings, the parsing method throws a <xref:System.FormatException> exception because it interprets 14 as the number of the month, not the last two digits of the year.
trans-unit.target: 但是，对字符串分析通过<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>反映标准的 EN-US 区域性设置，则分析方法将引发的对象<xref:System.FormatException>异常因为它将解释 14 的月数不在一年的最后两位数。

trans-unit.source: Serializing and deserializing date and time data
trans-unit.target: 序列化和反序列化的日期和时间数据

trans-unit.source: Serialized date and time data are expected to round-trip; that is, all serialized and deserialized values should be identical.
trans-unit.target: 序列化日期和时间数据应保存/还原;也就是说，所有序列化和反序列化的值应完全相同。

trans-unit.source: If a date and time value represents a single moment in time, the deserialized value should represent the same moment in time regardless of the culture or time zone of the system on which it was restored.
trans-unit.target: 如果日期和时间值表示单个时刻，反序列化的值应表示相同时间点而不考虑区域性或在其还原系统的时区。

trans-unit.source: To round-trip date and time data successfully, you must use the conventions of the invariant culture, which is returned by the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.InvariantInfo%2A> property, to generate and parse the data.
trans-unit.target: 往返行程日期和时间数据成功，你必须使用固定区域性，返回的约定<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.InvariantInfo%2A>属性，以生成和分析数据。

trans-unit.source: The formatting and parsing operations should never reflect the conventions of the default culture.
trans-unit.target: 在格式设置和分析操作应永远不会反映的默认区域性的约定。

trans-unit.source: If you use default cultural settings, the portability of the data is strictly limited; it can be successfully deserialized only on a thread whose cultural-specific settings are identical to those of the thread on which it was serialized.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用默认区域性设置，数据的可移植性是严格限制;它可以是线程的仅在线程的区域性特定的设置是线程的相同的依据其进行序列化上成功反序列化。

trans-unit.source: In some cases, this means that the data cannot even be successfully serialized and deserialized on the same system.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，这意味着，数据无法甚至成功序列化和反序列化相同系统上。

trans-unit.source: If the time component of a date and time value is significant, it should also be converted to UTC and serialized by using the "o" or "r" [standard format string](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md).
trans-unit.target: 如果日期和时间值的时间组件非常重要，它应此外转换为 UTC，并且使用"o"或"r"序列化[标准格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。

trans-unit.source: The time data can then be restored by calling a parsing method and passing it the appropriate format string along with the invariant culture as the `provider` argument.
trans-unit.target: 然后可以通过调用分析方法并将其传递相应的格式字符串沿具有固定区域性为还原时间数据`provider`自变量。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the process of round-tripping a date and time value.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例阐释了往返日期和时间值的过程。

trans-unit.source: It serializes a date and time on a system that observes U.S. Pacific time and whose current culture is en-US.
trans-unit.target: 其序列化的日期和时间观察到美国的系统上太平洋时间和当前区域性为 EN-US。

trans-unit.source: It deserializes the data on a system in the Brussels, Copenhagen, Madrid and Paris time zone and whose current culture is fr-FR.
trans-unit.target: 反序列化布鲁塞尔、 哥本哈根、 马德里和巴黎时区中的系统上的数据和当前区域性为 fr 法属

trans-unit.source: The restored date is nine hours later than the original date, which reflects the time zone adjustment from eight hours behind UTC to one hour ahead of UTC.
trans-unit.target: 还原的日期是 9 个小时晚于原始日期，反映从 UTC 晚八个小时到早于 UTC 一小时时区调整。

trans-unit.source: Both the original date and the restored date represent the same moment in time.
trans-unit.target: 原始日期和还原的日期表示相同的时刻。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses reflection to get the properties of the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object for the English (United States) culture.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用反射获取的属性<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>英语 （美国） 区域性的对象。

trans-unit.source: It displays the value of those properties that contain custom format strings and uses those strings to display formatted dates.
trans-unit.target: 它显示这些属性包含自定义格式字符串的值，并使用这些字符串来显示日期的格式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new writable instance of the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo" /> class that is culture-independent (invariant).
trans-unit.target: 初始化不依赖于区域性的（固定的）<see cref="T:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo" /> 类的新可写实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that represents the date and time information of the invariant culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数创建<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>表示固定区域性的日期和时间信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: To create a <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object for a specific culture, create a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object for that culture and retrieve the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object returned by its <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>特定区域性的对象，请创建<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>该区域性对象，并检索<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>对象由其<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: The properties of the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object created by this constructor can be modified.
trans-unit.target: 属性<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>可以修改此构造函数创建的对象。

trans-unit.source: However, you cannot modify the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A> property, because the invariant culture supports only a localized version of the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 但是，不能修改<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A>属性，因为固定区域性支持的本地化的版本的公历。

trans-unit.source: To create a <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that uses a specific calendar, you must instantiate a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that supports that calendar and assign the calendar to the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A> property of the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object returned by the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>对象，它使用特定的日历，必须实例化<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>对象，该对象支持的日历和分配到日历<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A>属性<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>返回对象<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a one-dimensional array of type <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the culture-specific abbreviated names of the days of the week.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 类型的一维数组，它包含周中各天的区域性特定的缩写名称。

trans-unit.source: A one-dimensional array of type <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the culture-specific abbreviated names of the days of the week.
trans-unit.target: 一个类型 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 的一维数组，它包含周中各天的特定于区域性的缩写名称。

trans-unit.source: The array for <see cref="P:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.InvariantInfo" /> contains "Sun", "Mon", "Tue", "Wed", "Thu", "Fri", and "Sat".
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.InvariantInfo" /> 的数组包含"Sun"、"Mon"、"Tue"、"Wed"、"Thu"、"Fri"和"Sat"。

trans-unit.source: If setting this property, the array must be one-dimensional and must have exactly seven elements.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置此属性，该数组必须是一维，并且必须完全七个元素。

trans-unit.source: The first element (the element at index zero) represents the first day of the week in the calendar defined by the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 第一个元素 （位于索引零的元素） 表示由定义日历中每周的第一天<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If a custom format string includes the "ddd" format specifier, the <xref:System.DateTime.ToString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%2A> method includes the appropriate member of the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.AbbreviatedDayNames%2A> array in place of the "ddd" in the result string.
trans-unit.target: 如果自定义格式字符串中包含"ddd"格式说明符，<xref:System.DateTime.ToString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%2A>方法包含的适当成员<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.AbbreviatedDayNames%2A>代替"ddd"在结果字符串中的数组。

trans-unit.source: This property is affected if the value of the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性受影响的值<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A>属性更改。

trans-unit.source: If the selected <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A> does not support abbreviated day names, the array contains the full day names.
trans-unit.target: 如果所选<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A>不支持缩写的星期几名称，则数组包含完整的星期几名称。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a read/write <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that represents the English (United States) culture and assigns abbreviated day names to its <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.AbbreviatedDayNames%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建读/写<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>对象，表示英语 （美国） 区域性，并将分配缩写的星期几名称到其<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.AbbreviatedDayNames%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: It then uses the "ddd" format specifier in a to display the string representation of dates for one week beginning May 28, 2014.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它使用中的"ddd"格式说明符来显示的字符串表示形式从 2014 年 5 月 28 日开始的一周的日期。

trans-unit.source: The property is being set to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 该属性设置为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The property is being set to an array that is multidimensional or that has a length that is not exactly 7.
trans-unit.target: 该属性正被设置为多维数组或者长度不是正好为 7 的数组。

trans-unit.source: The property is being set and the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo" /> object is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 设置了该属性，但 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo" /> 对象为只读。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string array of abbreviated month names associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与当前 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo" /> 对象关联的月份缩写名称的字符串数组。

trans-unit.source: An array of abbreviated month names.
trans-unit.target: 月份缩写名称的数组。

trans-unit.source: In some languages, a month name that is part of a date appears in the genitive case.
trans-unit.target: 在某些语言中，日期部分的月份名称将出现在所有格中。

trans-unit.source: For example, a date in the ru-RU or Russian (Russia) culture consists of the day number and the genitive month name, such as 1 Января (1 January).
trans-unit.target: 例如，RU-RU 或俄语 （俄罗斯） 区域性中的日期由天数和所有格月份名称，如 1 Января （1 年 1 月） 组成。

trans-unit.source: For these cultures, if a custom format string includes the "MMM" format specifier, the <xref:System.DateTime.ToString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%2A> method includes the appropriate member of the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.AbbreviatedMonthGenitiveNames%2A> array in place of the "MMM" in the result string.
trans-unit.target: 对于这些区域性，如果自定义格式字符串中包含"MMM"格式说明符，<xref:System.DateTime.ToString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%2A>方法包含的适当成员<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.AbbreviatedMonthGenitiveNames%2A>代替在结果字符串中的"MMM"的数组。

trans-unit.source: In a set operation, the array must be one-dimensional with exactly 13 elements, because <xref:System.Globalization.Calendar> objects accommodate calendars that have 13 months.
trans-unit.target: 在集运算中，该数组必须是一维 13 个元素，因为<xref:System.Globalization.Calendar>对象提供有 13 个月的日历。

trans-unit.source: For calendars that have 12 months, the thirteenth element should be <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 对于具有 12 个月的日历，第 13 个元素应为<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The first element (the element at index zero) represents the first month of the year defined by the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 第一个元素 （位于索引零的元素） 表示由该年的第一个月<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.AbbreviatedMonthGenitiveNames%2A> property, you must also set the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.AbbreviatedMonthNames%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.AbbreviatedMonthGenitiveNames%2A>属性，还必须设置<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.AbbreviatedMonthNames%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a read/write <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that represents the English (United States) culture and assigns abbreviated genitive month names to its <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.AbbreviatedMonthNames%2A> and <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.AbbreviatedMonthGenitiveNames%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建读/写<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>对象，表示英语 （美国） 区域性，并将分配缩写所有格月份名称传递给其<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.AbbreviatedMonthNames%2A>和<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.AbbreviatedMonthGenitiveNames%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: It then displays the string representation of dates that include the abbreviated month name of each month in the culture's supported calendar.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它显示的字符串表示形式包括区域性的支持日历中每个月的缩写的月份名称的日期。

trans-unit.source: In a set operation, the array is multidimensional or has a length that is not exactly 13.
trans-unit.target: 在设置操作中，该数组是多维数组或者长度不是正好为 13 的数组。

trans-unit.source: In a set operation, the array or one of the elements of the array is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 在设置操作中，数组或数组的其中一个元素为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 在设置操作中，当前的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo" /> 对象是只读的。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a one-dimensional string array that contains the culture-specific abbreviated names of the months.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一维字符串数组，它包含各月的特定于区域性的缩写名称。

trans-unit.source: A one-dimensional string array with 13 elements that contains the culture-specific abbreviated names of the months.
trans-unit.target: 一个具有 13 个元素的一维字符串数组，它包含各月的特定于区域性的缩写名称。

trans-unit.source: For 12-month calendars, the 13th element of the array is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 对于 12 个月的日历，数组的第 13 个元素是一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: The array for <see cref="P:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.InvariantInfo" /> contains "Jan", "Feb", "Mar", "Apr", "May", "Jun", "Jul", "Aug", "Sep", "Oct", "Nov", "Dec", and "".
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.InvariantInfo" /> 数组包含"Jan"、"Feb"、"Mar"、"Apr"、"May"、"Jun"、"Jul"、"Aug"、"Sep"、"Oct"、"Nov"、"Dec"和""。

trans-unit.source: If you set this property, the array must be one-dimensional with exactly 13 elements.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.Calendar> objects accommodate calendars with 13 months.

trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.AbbreviatedMonthNames%2A>属性，还必须设置<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.AbbreviatedMonthGenitiveNames%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.AbbreviatedMonthNames%2A> and <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.AbbreviatedMonthGenitiveNames%2A> properties are used to format dates using the following format strings:

trans-unit.source: A standard date and time format string that aliases a custom format string that includes the "MMM" format specifier.
trans-unit.target: 标准日期和时间格式字符串，别名自定义格式字符串，其中包含"MMM"格式说明符。

trans-unit.source: A custom date and time format string that includes the "MMM" format specifier.
trans-unit.target: 自定义日期和时间格式字符串，其中包含"MMM"格式说明符。

trans-unit.source: This property is affected if the value of the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性受影响的值<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A>属性更改。

trans-unit.source: If the selected <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A> does not support abbreviated month names, the array contains the full month names.

trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建读/写<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>对象，表示英语 （美国） 区域性，并将分配缩写所有格月份名称传递给其<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.AbbreviatedMonthNames%2A>和<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.AbbreviatedMonthGenitiveNames%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: It then displays the string representation of dates that include the abbreviated name of each month in the culture's supported calendar.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它显示的字符串表示形式包括区域性的支持日历中每个月的缩写的名称的日期。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the string designator for hours that are "ante meridiem" (before noon).
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置表示处于“上午”（中午前）的各小时的字符串指示符。

trans-unit.source: The string designator for hours that are ante meridiem.
trans-unit.target: 表示属于上午的各小时的字符串指示符。

trans-unit.source: The default for <see cref="P:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.InvariantInfo" /> is "AM".
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.InvariantInfo" /> 的默认值为"AM"。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.AMDesignator%2A> property is used for all times from 0:00:00 (midnight) to 11:59:59.999.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.AMDesignator%2A>属性适用于所有时间从 0:00:00 （午夜） 到 11:59:59.999。

trans-unit.source: If a custom format string includes the "tt" format specifier and the time is before noon, the <xref:System.DateTime.ToString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%2A> method includes the value of the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.AMDesignator%2A> property in place of "tt" in the result string.
trans-unit.target: 如果自定义格式字符串中包含"tt"格式说明符，时间是在中午前，<xref:System.DateTime.ToString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%2A>方法包含的值<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.AMDesignator%2A>来代替"tt"在结果字符串中的属性。

trans-unit.source: If the custom format string includes the "t" custom format specifier, only the first character of the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.AMDesignator%2A> property value is included.
trans-unit.target: 如果自定义格式字符串中包含"t"自定义格式说明符，仅首字符的<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.AMDesignator%2A>属性值将包括在内。

trans-unit.source: You should use "tt" for languages for which it is necessary to maintain the distinction between A.M.
trans-unit.target: 它是需要维护 A.M.之间差异的语言，应使用"tt"

trans-unit.source: and P.M.
trans-unit.target: 和下午

trans-unit.target: 一个示例是日语，在其中上午

trans-unit.source: and P.M.
trans-unit.target: 和下午

trans-unit.source: designators differ in the second character instead of the first character.
trans-unit.target: 指示符的差异而不是第一个字符的第二个字符。

trans-unit.source: For cultures that do not use an A.M.
trans-unit.target: 对于不使用上午区域性

trans-unit.source: designator, this property returns an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 指示符，此属性返回一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the calendar to use for the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于当前区域性的日历。

trans-unit.source: The calendar to use for the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 用于当前区域性的日历。

trans-unit.source: The default for <see cref="P:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.InvariantInfo" /> is a <see cref="T:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.InvariantInfo" /> 的默认值是一个 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A> property accepts only calendars that are valid for the culture that is associated with the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A>属性接受对与关联的区域性有效的日历<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.OptionalCalendars%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property specifies the calendars that can be used by a particular culture, and the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Calendar%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property specifies the default calendar for the culture.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.OptionalCalendars%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性指定可由特定区域性的日历和<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Calendar%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性指定区域性的默认日历。

trans-unit.source: Changing the value of this property affects the following properties as well: <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.MonthNames%2A>, <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.AbbreviatedMonthNames%2A>, <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.DayNames%2A>, <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.AbbreviatedDayNames%2A>, <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.CalendarWeekRule%2A>, <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.FirstDayOfWeek%2A>, <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.FullDateTimePattern%2A>, <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.LongDatePattern%2A>, <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.ShortDatePattern%2A>, <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.YearMonthPattern%2A>, and <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.MonthDayPattern%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 更改此属性的值会影响以下属性： <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.MonthNames%2A>， <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.AbbreviatedMonthNames%2A>， <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.DayNames%2A>， <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.AbbreviatedDayNames%2A>， <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.CalendarWeekRule%2A>， <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.FirstDayOfWeek%2A>， <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.FullDateTimePattern%2A>， <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.LongDatePattern%2A>， <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.ShortDatePattern%2A>， <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.YearMonthPattern%2A>和<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.MonthDayPattern%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the culture of the current thread is Japanese, this property accepts <xref:System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar>, <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendarTypes.Localized><xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>, or <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendarTypes.USEnglish><xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果当前线程的区域性为日语，此属性接受<xref:System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar>， <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendarTypes.Localized> <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>，或<xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendarTypes.USEnglish> <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar> is used, the default long date specifier is "gg y'\x5e74'M'\x6708'd'\x65e5'".
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar>使用默认的长日期说明符是"gg y '\x5e74 AM' \x6708 具有 \x65e5"。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendarTypes.Localized><xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>, is used, the default long date specifier is "yyyy'\x5e74'M'\x6708'd'\x65e5'".
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendarTypes.Localized> <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>，使用默认的长日期说明符是"yyyy '\x5e74 AM' \x6708 具有 \x65e5"。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a `ChangeCalendar` method that changes a culture's current calendar to a specified calendar unless it is already the current calendar or if it is not supported by the culture.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例定义`ChangeCalendar`区域性的当前日历更改为指定日历，除非它已是当前日历或不受区域性的方法。

trans-unit.source: The code that calls the method instantiates a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that represents the Arabic (Egypt) culture and first attempts to change its calendar to the Japanese calendar.
trans-unit.target: 调用的方法的代码实例化<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>对象，表示阿拉伯语 （埃及） 区域性并首先尝试更改其日历为日本日历。

trans-unit.source: Because the Japanese calendar is not supported, the method makes not change the culture's calendar.
trans-unit.target: 由于不支持日语日历，则该方法会使不更改区域性的日历。

trans-unit.source: However, because the Umm al-Qura calendar is a member of the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.OptionalCalendars%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> collection, the method does succeed in making it the current calendar for the ar-EG culture.
trans-unit.target: 但是，因为 um al Qura 日历为属于<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.OptionalCalendars%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>集合，该方法未在当前日历从而的成功 AR-EG 区域性。

trans-unit.source: The property is being set to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 该属性设置为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 设置了该属性，但 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo" /> 对象为只读。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies which rule is used to determine the first calendar week of the year.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定使用哪个规则确定该年的第一个日历周。

trans-unit.source: A value that determines the first calendar week of the year.
trans-unit.target: 确定该年的第一个日历周的值。

trans-unit.source: The default for <see cref="P:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.InvariantInfo" /> is <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CalendarWeekRule.FirstDay" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.InvariantInfo" /> 的默认值是 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CalendarWeekRule.FirstDay" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is affected if the value of the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性受影响的值<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A>属性更改。

trans-unit.source: The property is being set to a value that is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CalendarWeekRule" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 该属性正被设置的值不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CalendarWeekRule" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: In a set operation, the current <see cref="T:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo" /> object is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 在设置操作中，当前的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo" /> 对象是只读的。

trans-unit.source: Creates a shallow copy of the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo" /> 的浅表副本。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo" /> object copied from the original <see cref="T:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: 从原始 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo" /> 复制的新 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: The clone is writable even if the original <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 克隆可写即使原始<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>对象是只读的。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the properties of the clone can be modified with user-defined patterns.
trans-unit.target: 因此，可以使用用户定义的模式修改克隆的属性。

trans-unit.source: A shallow copy of an object is a copy of the object only.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象的浅表副本是只是对象的副本。

trans-unit.source: If the object contains references to other objects, the shallow copy does not create copies of the referred objects.
trans-unit.target: 如果对象包含对其他对象的引用，则浅表复制不创建所引用对象的副本。

trans-unit.source: It refers to the original objects instead.
trans-unit.target: 它而是指原始对象。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, a deep copy of an object creates a copy of the object and a copy of everything directly or indirectly referenced by that object.
trans-unit.target: 相比之下，对象的深层副本创建的对象的副本以及直接或间接引用该对象的所有内容的副本。

trans-unit.source: Gets a read-only <see cref="T:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo" /> object that formats values based on the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 获取基于当前区域性对值进行格式设置的只读的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A read-only <see cref="T:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo" /> object based on the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object for the current thread.
trans-unit.target: 一个基于当前线程的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> 对象的只读的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object returned by the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.CurrentInfo%2A> property reflects user overrides.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>返回对象<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.CurrentInfo%2A>属性反映用户重写。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.CurrentInfo%2A> property to retrieve a <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that represents the formatting conventions of the current culture, which in this case is the en-US culture.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.CurrentInfo%2A>属性，以检索<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>对象，表示当前区域性，在这种情况下即 EN-US 区域性的格式设置约定。

trans-unit.source: It then displays the format string and the result string for six formatting properties.
trans-unit.target: 它将显示格式字符串和六个的格式设置属性的结果字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the string that separates the components of a date, that is, the year, month, and day.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置分隔日期中各组成部分（即年、月、日）的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The string that separates the components of a date, that is, the year, month, and day.
trans-unit.target: 分隔日期中各组成部分（即年、月、日）的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The default for <see cref="P:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.InvariantInfo" /> is "/".
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.InvariantInfo" /> 的默认值为“/”。

trans-unit.source: If a custom format string includes the "/" format specifier, the <xref:System.DateTime.ToString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method displays the value of <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.DateSeparator%2A> in place of the "/" in the result string.
trans-unit.target: 如果自定义格式字符串中包含"/"格式说明符，<xref:System.DateTime.ToString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法显示的值<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.DateSeparator%2A>代替"/"在结果字符串中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.DateSeparator%2A> property defines the string that replaces the date separator ("/" custom date and time format specifier) in a result string in a formatting operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.DateSeparator%2A>属性定义来代替日期分隔符的字符串 （"/"自定义日期和时间格式说明符） 中的结果字符串中的格式设置操作。

trans-unit.source: It also defines the date separator string in a parsing operation.
trans-unit.target: 它还定义分析操作中的日期分隔符字符串。

trans-unit.source: The following example instantiates a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object for the en-US culture, changes its date separator to "-", and displays a date by using the "d", "G", and "g" standard format strings.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例实例化<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>对象对于 EN-US 区域性中，更改到其日期分隔符"-"，并通过使用"d"、"G"和"g"标准格式字符串来显示日期。

trans-unit.source: The property is being set to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 该属性设置为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The property is being set and the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo" /> object is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 设置了该属性，但 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo" /> 对象为只读。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a one-dimensional string array that contains the culture-specific full names of the days of the week.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一维字符串数组，它包含该周中各天的特定于区域性的完整名称。

trans-unit.source: A one-dimensional string array that contains the culture-specific full names of the days of the week.
trans-unit.target: 一个一维字符串数组，它包含周中各天的特定于区域性的完整名称。

trans-unit.source: The array for <see cref="P:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.InvariantInfo" /> contains "Sunday", "Monday", "Tuesday", "Wednesday", "Thursday", "Friday", and "Saturday".
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.InvariantInfo" /> 数组包含"Sunday"、"Monday"、"Tuesday"、"Wednesday"、"Thursday"、"Friday"和"Saturday"。

trans-unit.source: If setting this property, the array must be one-dimensional and must have exactly seven elements.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置此属性，该数组必须是一维，并且必须完全七个元素。

trans-unit.source: The first element (the element at index zero) represents the first day of the week in the calendar defined by the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 第一个元素 （位于索引零的元素） 表示由定义日历中每周的第一天<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If a custom format string includes the "dddd" format specifier, the <xref:System.DateTime.ToString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method includes the value of the appropriate <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.DayNames%2A> member in place of "dddd" in the result string.
trans-unit.target: 如果自定义格式字符串中包含"dddd"格式说明符，<xref:System.DateTime.ToString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法包含相应的值<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.DayNames%2A>代替"dddd"在结果字符串中的成员。

trans-unit.source: This property is affected if the value of the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性受影响的值<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A>属性更改。

trans-unit.source: The property is being set to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 该属性设置为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 该属性正被设置为多维数组或者长度不是正好为 7 的数组。

trans-unit.target: 设置了该属性，但 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo" /> 对象为只读。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the first day of the week.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一周的第一天。

trans-unit.target: 表示一周的第一天的枚举值。

trans-unit.target: 设置了该属性，但 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo" /> 对象为只读。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the custom format string for a long date and long time value.
trans-unit.target: 为长日期和长时间值获取或设置自定义格式字符串。

trans-unit.source: The custom format string for a long date and long time value.
trans-unit.target: 长日期和时间值的自定义格式字符串。

trans-unit.source: The "F" standard format string is an alias for the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.FullDateTimePattern%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: "F"标准格式字符串是的别名<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.FullDateTimePattern%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: In other words, the custom format string assigned to this property defines the format of the result string for the "F" standard format string.
trans-unit.target: 换而言之，分配给此属性的自定义格式字符串定义的"F"标准格式字符串的结果字符串的格式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[标准日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.FullDateTimePattern%2A> property is generated dynamically by concatenating the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.LongDatePattern%2A> and <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.LongTimePattern%2A> properties separated by a space.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.FullDateTimePattern%2A>通过串联动态生成属性<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.LongDatePattern%2A>和<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.LongTimePattern%2A>属性，并用空格分隔。

trans-unit.source: This dynamic assignment occurs under the following conditions:
trans-unit.target: 在以下情况下进行此动态分配：

trans-unit.source: If the property value is retrieved before it has been explicitly set.
trans-unit.target: 如果之前检索此属性值已显式设置。

trans-unit.source: When the value of the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.LongDatePattern%2A> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 时的值<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.LongDatePattern%2A>属性更改。

trans-unit.source: When the value of the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.LongTimePattern%2A> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 时的值<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.LongTimePattern%2A>属性更改。

trans-unit.source: This property is affected if the value of the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性受影响的值<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A>属性更改。

trans-unit.target: 下面的示例显示的值<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.FullDateTimePattern%2A>某些区域性。

trans-unit.source: The integer representing the era.
trans-unit.target: 表示纪元的整数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the string containing the abbreviated name of the specified era, if an abbreviation exists.
trans-unit.target: 返回包含指定纪元的缩写名称的字符串（如果缩写名称存在）。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the abbreviated name of the specified era, if an abbreviation exists.
trans-unit.target: 包含指定纪元的缩写名称的字符串（如果缩写名称存在）。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: A string containing the full name of the era, if an abbreviation does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 包含纪元的完整名称的字符串（如果缩写名称不存在）。

trans-unit.source: The era name is the name a calendar uses to refer to a period of time reckoned from a fixed point or event.
trans-unit.target: 纪元名称是日历用来引用一段时间推测从固定的点或事件的名称。

trans-unit.source: For example, "A.D."
trans-unit.target: 例如，"公元"

trans-unit.source: or "C.E."
trans-unit.target: 或者"开始"

trans-unit.source: is the current era in the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 为当前纪元公历日历中。

trans-unit.source: The valid values for `era` are listed in the <xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.Eras%2A> property of the appropriate class derived from <xref:System.Globalization.Calendar>.
trans-unit.target: 有效值`era`中列出<xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.Eras%2A>属性的适当的类派生自<xref:System.Globalization.Calendar>。

trans-unit.source: For example: <xref:System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar.Eras%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> displays a list of eras that are supported by this implementation.
trans-unit.target: 例如：<xref:System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar.Eras%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>显示的此实现支持的纪元列表。

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar> class, the abbreviated era name is the first character of the full era name.
trans-unit.target: 在<xref:System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar>类，缩写的纪元名称是完整的纪元名称的第一个字符。

trans-unit.source: This character is either the single-character case-insensitive Latin alphabet abbreviation or the single-character Kanji abbreviation.
trans-unit.target: 该字符是单字符不区分大小写拉丁字母缩写或单字符日文汉字缩写。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="era" /> does not represent a valid era in the calendar specified in the <see cref="P:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="era" /> 不表示在 <see cref="P:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar" /> 属性中指定的日历中的有效纪元。

trans-unit.source: If <see cref="P:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar" /> is the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar" /> but the <see cref="P:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture" /> is not "zh-TW", then <see cref="P:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.NativeCalendarName" />, <see cref="M:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.GetEraName(System.Int32)" />, and <see cref="M:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.GetAbbreviatedEraName(System.Int32)" /> return an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 如果<see cref="P:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar" />是<see cref="T:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar" />但<see cref="P:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture" />不是"ZH-TW"，然后<see cref="P:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.NativeCalendarName" />， <see cref="M:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.GetEraName(System.Int32)" />，和<see cref="M:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.GetAbbreviatedEraName(System.Int32)" />返回空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 through 13 representing the name of the month to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 1 到 13 之间的一个整数，用于表示要检索的月份的名称。

trans-unit.target: 由 <paramref name="month" /> 表示的月份的区域性特定的缩写名称。

trans-unit.target: 对于默认的固定<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>对象，此方法将返回字符串中的<xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>对象。

"Apr"
"May"

<xref:System.Globalization.Calendar> objects can accommodate calendars with 13 months.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.Calendar> 对象可以适应具有 13 个月的日历。

trans-unit.source: For 12-month calendars, the empty string is always returned as the name of the 13th month.
trans-unit.target: 对于 12 个月日历，则始终作为名称的第 13 个月返回空字符串。

trans-unit.source: Returns the standard patterns in which date and time values can be formatted.
trans-unit.target: 返回可用于对日期和时间值进行格式设置的标准模式。

trans-unit.source: Returns all the standard patterns in which date and time values can be formatted.
trans-unit.target: 返回可用于对日期和时间值进行格式设置的所有标准模式。

trans-unit.source: An array that contains the standard patterns in which date and time values can be formatted.
trans-unit.target: 一个数组，包含可以用于对日期和时间值进行格式设置的标准模式。

trans-unit.source: This method returns an array that contains all custom format strings that correspond to standard format strings.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回一个数组，包含对应于标准格式字符串的所有自定义格式字符串。

trans-unit.source: See [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) for a list of the standard format strings.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[标准日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)有关标准格式字符串的列表。

trans-unit.source: You can use the custom format strings in the array returned by the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.GetAllDateTimePatterns%2A> method in formatting operations.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用自定义格式字符串中返回的数组<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.GetAllDateTimePatterns%2A>在格式设置操作的方法。

trans-unit.source: However, if you do, the string representation of a date and time value returned in that formatting operation cannot always be parsed successfully by the `Parse` and `TryParse` methods.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果这样做的字符串表示形式的日期和时间值返回在于格式设置操作无法始终分析成功通过`Parse`和`TryParse`方法。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you cannot assume that the custom format strings returned by the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.GetAllDateTimePatterns%2A> method can be used to round-trip date and time values.
trans-unit.target: 因此，不能假定返回的自定义格式字符串<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.GetAllDateTimePatterns%2A>方法可以用于往返行程日期和时间值。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates this problem.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例阐释了此问题。

trans-unit.source: It retrieves a <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that contains formatting information for the Italy (Italian) culture.
trans-unit.target: 它检索<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>包含意大利 （意大利语） 区域性的格式设置信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: It passes each custom format string in the array returned by the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.GetAllDateTimePatterns> method to the <xref:System.DateTime.ToString%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to create the string representation of a date and time.
trans-unit.target: 它通过每个自定义格式字符串中返回的数组<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.GetAllDateTimePatterns>方法<xref:System.DateTime.ToString%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法创建的字符串表示形式的日期和时间。

trans-unit.source: This example then attempts to parse this value by calling the <xref:System.DateTime.TryParse%28System.String%2CSystem.DateTime%40%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 此示例然后尝试通过调用分析此值<xref:System.DateTime.TryParse%28System.String%2CSystem.DateTime%40%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: As the output from the example shows, some of the custom format strings do not produce a date and time value that successfully round-trips.
trans-unit.target: 如示例输出所示，某些自定义格式字符串不会生成日期和时间值，它成功往返。

trans-unit.source: To parse the string representation of a date and time that can be expressed in a number of predefined custom formats, call one of the following methods:
trans-unit.target: 若要分析的字符串表示形式的日期和时间，可以表示了大量预定义的自定义格式，请调用以下方法之一：

trans-unit.source: The custom format strings in the array returned by the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.GetAllDateTimePatterns%2A> method depends on the current calendar of the culture for which the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object supplies formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 返回的数组中的自定义格式字符串<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.GetAllDateTimePatterns%2A>方法依赖于区域性的当前日历为其<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>对象提供格式设置信息。

trans-unit.source: If the calendar changes, the array returned by this method also changes.
trans-unit.target: 如果更改日历，此方法返回的数组也会更改。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays the date and time format strings for the invariant culture, as well as the result string that is produced when that format string is used to format a particular date.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例显示日期和时间格式字符串，用于固定区域性，以及生成时，该格式字符串用于设置特定日期的格式的结果字符串。

trans-unit.source: The example instantiates a <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that represents the invariant culture by calling the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 该示例实例化<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>通过调用表示固定区域性的对象<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: It could also retrieve a <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> that represents the invariant culture from the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.InvariantInfo%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 它无法检索<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>表示固定区域性<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.InvariantInfo%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: A standard format string.
trans-unit.target: 标准格式字符串。

trans-unit.source: Returns all the patterns in which date and time values can be formatted using the specified standard format string.
trans-unit.target: 返回可在其中使用指定标准格式字符串对日期和时间值进行格式设置的所有模式。

trans-unit.source: An array containing the standard patterns in which date and time values can be formatted using the specified format string.
trans-unit.target: 一个数组，它包含可在其中使用指定格式字符串对日期和时间值进行格式设置的标准模式。

trans-unit.source: This method returns an array containing the custom format strings that correspond to a particular standard format string.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回包含对应于特定的标准格式字符串的自定义格式字符串的数组。

trans-unit.source: See [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) for a list of the standard format strings.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[标准日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)有关标准格式字符串的列表。

trans-unit.source: You can use the custom format strings in the array returned by the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.GetAllDateTimePatterns%2A> method in formatting operations.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用自定义格式字符串中返回的数组<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.GetAllDateTimePatterns%2A>在格式设置操作的方法。

trans-unit.source: However, if you do, the string representation of a date and time value returned in that formatting operation cannot always be parsed successfully by the `Parse` and `TryParse` methods.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果这样做的字符串表示形式的日期和时间值返回在于格式设置操作无法始终分析成功通过`Parse`和`TryParse`方法。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you cannot assume that the custom format strings returned by the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.GetAllDateTimePatterns%2A> method can be used to round-trip date and time values.
trans-unit.target: 因此，不能假定返回的自定义格式字符串<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.GetAllDateTimePatterns%2A>方法可以用于往返行程日期和时间值。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates this problem.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例阐释了此问题。

trans-unit.source: It retrieves a <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that contains formatting information for the Russia (Russian) culture.
trans-unit.target: 它检索<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>包含俄罗斯 （俄语） 区域性的格式设置信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: It calls the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.GetAllDateTimePatterns%28System.Char%29> method for each standard format string, and then passes each custom format string in the returned array to the <xref:System.DateTime.ToString%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to create the string representation of a date and time.
trans-unit.target: 它调用<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.GetAllDateTimePatterns%28System.Char%29>每个标准格式字符串，然后每个自定义格式字符串到返回的数组中的传递方法<xref:System.DateTime.ToString%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法创建的字符串表示形式的日期和时间。

trans-unit.source: This example then attempts to parse this value by calling the <xref:System.DateTime.TryParse%28System.String%2CSystem.DateTime%40%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 此示例然后尝试通过调用分析此值<xref:System.DateTime.TryParse%28System.String%2CSystem.DateTime%40%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: As the output from the example shows, some of the custom format strings do not produce a date and time value that successfully round-trips.
trans-unit.target: 如示例输出所示，某些自定义格式字符串不会生成日期和时间值，它成功往返。

trans-unit.source: To parse the string representation of a date and time that can be expressed in a number of predefined custom formats, call one of the following methods:
trans-unit.target: 若要分析的字符串表示形式的日期和时间，可以表示了大量预定义的自定义格式，请调用以下方法之一：

trans-unit.source: The custom format strings in the array returned by the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.GetAllDateTimePatterns%2A> method depends on the current calendar of the culture for which the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object supplies formatting information.

trans-unit.source: If the calendar changes, the array returned by this method also changes.
trans-unit.target: 如果更改日历，此方法返回的数组也会更改。

trans-unit.source: The era name is the name a calendar uses to refer to a period of time reckoned from a fixed point or event.
trans-unit.target: 纪元名称是日历用来引用一段时间推测从固定的点或事件的名称。

trans-unit.source: For example, "A.D."
trans-unit.target: 例如，"公元"

trans-unit.source: or "C.E."
trans-unit.target: 或者"开始"

trans-unit.source: is the current era in the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 为当前纪元公历日历中。

trans-unit.source: The comparison with `eraName` is case-insensitive, for example, "A.D."
trans-unit.target: 与比较`eraName`不区分大小写，例如，"公元"

trans-unit.source: is equivalent to "a.d.".
trans-unit.target: 等效于"公元"。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.GetEra%2A> ignores punctuation in abbreviated era names, only if the <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar> is selected in <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and the culture uses "A.D."
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.GetEra%2A> 仅当忽略缩写的纪元名称中的标点<xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>中选择<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>并且区域性使用"公元"

trans-unit.source: as the era name, that is, "A.D."
trans-unit.target: 作为纪元名称，即"公元"

trans-unit.source: is equivalent to "AD".
trans-unit.target: 等效于"AD"。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.GetEra%2A> compares `eraName` with the full era name returned by <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.GetEraName%2A> and with the abbreviated era name returned by <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.GetAbbreviatedEraName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.GetEra%2A> 比较`eraName`与返回的完整纪元名称<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.GetEraName%2A>返回的缩写的纪元名称的与<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.GetAbbreviatedEraName%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Your application can get a <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object for a specific culture using one of the following methods:
trans-unit.target: 你的应用程序可以获取<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>使用以下方法之一对特定区域性的对象：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.GetInstance%2A> method, where `provider` is a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object can be created only for the invariant culture or for specific cultures, not for neutral cultures.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>只能用于固定区域性或特定区域性 （而不能为非特定区域性） 创建对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the invariant culture, specific cultures, and neutral cultures, see the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> class description.
trans-unit.target: 有关固定区域性、 特定区域性和非特定区域性的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>类的说明。
